TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SmartLabelStyle extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供用于执行基于规则的数据点标签智能定位的方法和属性，以解决数据点标签重叠的问题。

span.span: Provides methods and properties used to perform intelligent, rule-based data point label positioning to resolve overlapping data point label issues.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 启用智能标签后，该图表重新定位数据点标签重叠，根据一组用户定义的规则。When smart labels are enabled, the chart repositions overlapping data point labels, based on a set of user-defined rules. 将绘制标注线条链接具有其数据点标签。Callout lines will be drawn to link the label with its data point. 可以控制在标注线条的可视属性。The visual attributes of the callout line can be controlled. 这些 visual 属性包括颜色、 线型和线条宽度。These visual attributes include color, line style, and line width. 和属性控制的修饰符，如箭头，显示在标注线条末尾。The and properties control the embellishments, such as arrowheads, that appear at the end of the callout line. 属性可以设置为任何对象。The property can be set to any object. 如果设置标注线条的颜色，则还会自动将设置的颜色和所定义的修饰符。If you set the color of the callout line, you will also automatically set the color of the and the embellishment defined by the . 属性控制在标注线条的像素宽度。The property controls the pixel width of the callout line. 使用此属性还将扩展的修饰符和。Use of this property will also scale the embellishments of the and the . 可以通过使用多个运动相关属性控制智能标签的移动。The movement of smart labels can be controlled through the use of several motion-related properties. 这些定义移动的方向，距离的规则，并指示的数据点标签是否允许将保留在绘图区。These define the rules of movement for the direction, distance and whether the data point label is allowed to leave the plotting area. 默认的移动规则通常将解决大多数问题。The default movement rules will normally resolve most issues. 定义一个值，指定允许数据点标签在重叠时移动的最大距离，以像素为单位的数据点。The defines a value that specifies the maximum distance in pixels from the data point that data point labels are allowed to be moved in case of overlapping. 属性定义一个值，指定的最小距离，以像素为单位的数据点，将在重叠时移动的数据点标签。The property defines a value that specifies the minimum distance in pixels from the data point that data point labels will be moved in case of overlapping. 当数据点标签需要重新定位时，标签将至少移动指定的像素数。When a data point label needs to be repositioned, the label will be moved by at least the number of pixels specified. 属性指示当重叠问题不能解决时是否隐藏标签。The property indicates whether the labels are hidden when overlapping issues cannot be resolved. 如果属性是`true`，且不能在指定的区域内绘制数据点并中所允许的方向，将不绘制数据点标签。If the property is `true`, and the data point cannot be drawn within the area specified by and in the directions allowed by , the data point label will not be drawn. 属性定义可以在其中移动的数据点标签的方向。The property defines the direction(s) in which the data point label can be moved. 此属性接受一个值或按位 OR，多个值。This property accepts one value or a bitwise-OR of multiple values. 默认值是按位 OR，所有的值，以允许在所有可能的方向不同点的数据中心重新定位。The default is the bitwise-OR of all values, to allow repositioning in all possible directions except to the center of the data point. 以下图表类型不支持智能标签：Smart labels are not supported for the following chart types: - 条形图： 条形图和百分比堆积条形图。Bar charts: bar and hundred-percent-stacked bar charts. - 形状图： 饼图、 圆环图、 极坐标图和雷达图图表。Shape charts: pie, doughnut, polar and radar charts. - 全距图： 范围、 范围柱形图和范围条形图。Range charts: range, range column and range bar charts. - 堆积面积图： 堆积面积图和百分比堆积面积图。Stacked area charts: stacked area and hundred-percent-stacked area charts.

public: SmartLabelStyle();

summary.span: 获取或设置一个标志，该标志指示是否将隐藏无法重新定位的重叠标签。

span.span: Gets or sets a flag that indicates whether overlapped labels that cannot be repositioned will be hidden.

value.span: 如果隐藏发生重叠的标签，则为 。

span.span: if labels will be hidden if they overlap.

value.span: 如果不会隐藏重叠的标签，则为 。

span.span: if overlapped labels will not be hidden.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不能由属性指定的区域内绘制点并，在所允许的方向，属性和此属性是`true`，将不绘制数据点标签。If the point cannot be drawn within the area specified by the properties and , in the directions allowed by the , property, and this property is `true`, the data point label will not be drawn. > [!NOTE] > 智能标签才起作用时属性设置为零。Smart labels only work when the property is set to zero.

summary.span: 获取或设置重叠的 对象可移动的方向。

span.span: Gets or sets the direction(s) in which the overlapped object is allowed to be moved.

value.span: 一个 枚举值或多个经过按位或计算的 值。

span.span: A enumeration value or multiple bitwise OR'd values.

value.span: 默认值是可在所有方向（到数据点中心的方向除外）上重新定位的所有 值的按位或。

span.span: The default is the bitwise OR of all values to allow repositioning in all directions except to the center of the data point.
